MOV A, 1
MOV B, 0
MOV B, A
MOV C, short [0x0666]
MOV A, [C]
INT
HALT

Hand-assembled, just for you:

0x0003 0x0B 0x03 0x00000001 0x00000001
0x0003 0x0B 0x03 0x00000002 0x00000000
0x0003 0x0B 0x0B 0x00000002 0x00000001
0x0003 0x0B 0x05 0x00000003 0x00000666
0x0003 0x0B 0x0F 0x00000001 0x00000003
0x0002 0x00 0x00 0x00000000 0x00000000
0x0001 0x00 0x00 0x00000000 0x00000000
